meaningMnemonic: You use your <radical>car</radical> and an <radical>axe</radical> to <kanji>slice</kanji> down a pedestrian. This innocent guy is just walking along the road when you drive up to him in your car and axe him to death with your axe. You’re all like, VROOM! AXE! Now this guy is dead because you sliced him down in cold blood.
readingMnemonic: You were driving around in <reading>Zan</reading>zibar (ざん) when you <kanji>slice</kanji>d down this man. Luckily, Zanzibar has no laws at all, so you won’t get arrested for slicing down this guy with your axe.
